hanzi-su-wiki:
抹

Значения

Втирать, растирать

Мнемоника

Втирать руками 扌 мазь до конца 末, пока не вотрешь.

purpleculture_info:
Pictophonetic: 末 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Step by Step Stroke Sequence:
purpleculture_examples:
涂抹 [ tú mǒ ]: to paint; to smear; to apply (makeup etc); to doodle; to erase; to obliterate
抹杀 [ mǒ shā ]: to erase; to cover traces; to obliterate evidence; to expunge; to blot out; to suppress
抹黑 [ mǒ hēi ]: to discredit; to defame; to smear sb's name; to bring shame upon (oneself or one's family etc); to blacken (e.g. commando's face for camouflage); to black out or obliterate (e.g. censored words)
抹脖子 [ mǒ bó zi ]: to slit one's own throat; to commit suicide
浓妆艳抹 [ nóng zhuāng yàn mǒ ]: to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom); dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
抹布 [ mā bù ]: cleaning rag; also pr. [mo3 bu4]
乌漆抹黑 [ wū qī mā hēi ]: see 乌漆墨黑
拐弯抹角 [ guǎi wān mò jiǎo ]: lit. going round the curves and skirting the corners (idiom); fig. to speak in a roundabout way; to equivocate; to beat about the bush
转弯抹角 [ zhuǎn wān mò jiǎo ]: see 拐弯抹角
抹胸 [ mò xiōng ]: old feminine garment, covering chest and abdomen
转变抹角 [ zhuǎn biàn mò jiǎo ]: lit. (of road) winding and turning (idiom); to speak in a roundabout way; to equivocate; to beat about the bush

heisig_chinese_memo: Use your last finger (pinky) to smear on some face cream because it's the most precise. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: rub, finger, fingers, extremity, one, tree, wood
koohiiStory1: I like to RUB my FINGERS over my EXTREMITIES ....like my extremity-ly long, umm, hair.... This has been edited in response to being reported ...you can change "hair" to whatever extremity-ly long body part you like.
koohiiStory2: When you´re cold, your RUB your FINGERS over your EXTREMITIES vigorously to warm up a bit. I´d still rather go in for a warm fire and some hot cocoa, though.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Put your fingers in a jet if you want to erase them from existence. You aren't just chopping or burning them off. There's like, no trace of them at all. Your parents can't even remember if you were born with fingers or not. Jets are that powerful.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine your fingers slowly getting closer and closer to the jet's engine. It feels like it's going to suck your whole body in. And you better watch out, because if it does you'll be erased from the planet. And probably from time itself.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're almost done erasing your fingers when the jet starts sucking all of you in. You would try to grab the closest thing to you, but your fingers don't exist anymore, so you hold onto the mats (まつ) at your feet with your toes. The mats are super strong (they're made for jets, after all) and you manage to save yourself!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you're so thankful to the mats. If they weren't there you might have erased your whole body! Thank you mats! I'll never walk on you without thanking you for your service again!
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 末 (すえ、マツ、バツ окончание). Растирать рукой (扌) в ничто (окончание, 末).
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ｜, 亠 (крышка), ハ, 扎, 木 (дерево)

mǒ: (глаг/сч.слово) мазать, наносить; вычеркивать, стирать; вытирать; луч
mò: (глаг) штукатурить, шпаклевать; обходить, огибать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the end (末) of your hand (扌) is erased
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Use your last finger (pinky) to smear on some face cream because it's the most precise. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " end " sound, it means applying and smearing. Tang Dufu "Bei Zheng": "Students do everything, so Xiaozhuang just puts on them."

"To wipe " can mean to erase or remove. On the volume of Tang Su'e "Du Yang Miscellaneous Compilation": "The trial production department is in the Palace of Xuanzheng, or if there is an absurd word, it is the end of the thick brush."

" Wipe " also means touch and touch. Yuan Gao Wenxiu's first fold of "Black Whirlwind": "I and you are waiting to wave my hands and go rampant, discipline him to wipe my nothing clean."

" Wipe " also means sweeping away, sweeping. Song Su Shi, "Yu Lou Chun": "A beautiful lady still sings drunkard poetry, for forty-three years it has been like electric wipes."

" Wipe " also refers to light pressing, that is, a fingering for playing a stringed instrument. Tang Bai Juyi's "Pipa Xing": "Lightly close, slowly twist and pick, first "Neon Clothes" and "Green Waist"."

" Wipe " also refers to rubbing and wiping. Yuan Li Wenwei "Yan Qing Bo Yu" second fold: "Quickly wipe the shallow basin with me and sharpen the blade."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand " to the sound of " end ", it means applying and smearing.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「末」聲，表示塗敷、塗抹。唐杜甫〈北征〉：「學母無不為，曉粧隨手抹。」

　　「抹」可表示塗掉、除去。唐蘇鶚《杜陽雜編》卷上：「上試制科於宣政殿，或有詞理乖謬者，即濃筆抹之至尾。」

　　「抹」也表示碰、摸。元高文秀〈黑旋風〉第一摺：「我和你待擺手去橫行，管教他抹著我的無乾淨。」

　　「抹」還表示一掃而過、掃視。宋蘇軾〈玉樓春〉：「佳人猶唱醉翁詞，四十三年如電抹。」

　　「抹」也指輕按，即彈奏弦樂器的一種指法。唐白居易〈琵琶行〉：「輕攏慢撚抹復挑，初為《霓裳》後《綠腰》。」

　　「抹」亦指擦、揩拭。元李文蔚〈燕青博魚〉第二摺：「快與我抹下淺盆，磨下刀刃。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「末」聲，表示塗敷、塗抹。

從「 手 」，「 末 」聲，表示塗敷、塗抹。唐杜甫〈北征〉：「學母無不為，曉粧隨手抹。」 「 抹 」可表示塗掉、除去。唐蘇鶚《杜陽雜編》卷上：「上試制科於宣政殿，或有詞理乖謬者，即濃筆抹之至尾。」 「 抹 」也表示碰、摸。元高文秀〈黑旋風〉第一摺：「我和你待擺手去橫行，管教他抹著我的無乾淨。」 「 抹 」還表示一掃而過、掃視。宋蘇軾〈玉樓春〉：「佳人猶唱醉翁詞，四十三年如電抹。」 「 抹 」也指輕按，即彈奏弦樂器的一種指法。唐白居易〈琵琶行〉：「輕攏慢撚抹復挑，初為《霓裳》後《綠腰》。」 「 抹 」亦指擦、揩拭。元李文蔚〈燕青博魚〉第二摺：「快與我抹下淺盆，磨下刀刃。」
From " hand" to " end" sound, it means applying and smearing. Tang Dufu "Bei Zheng": "Students do everything, so Xiaozhuang just puts on them." "To wipe" can mean to erase or remove. On the volume of Tang Su'e "Du Yang Miscellaneous Compilation": "The trial production department is in the Palace of Xuanzheng, or if there is an absurd word, it is the end of the thick brush." " Wipe" also means touch and touch. Yuan Gao Wenxiu's first fold of "Black Whirlwind": "I and you are waiting to wave my hands and go rampant, discipline him to wipe my nothing clean." " Wipe" also means sweeping away, sweeping. Song Su Shi, "Yu Lou Chun": "A beautiful lady still sings drunkard poetry, for forty-three years it has been like electric wipes." " Wipe" also refers to light pressing, that is, a fingering for playing a stringed instrument. Tang Bai Juyi's "Pipa Xing": "Lightly close, slowly twist and pick, first "Neon Clothes" and "Green Waist"." " Wipe" also refers to rubbing and wiping. Yuan Li Wenwei "Yan Qing Bo Yu" second fold: "Quickly wipe the shallow basin with me and sharpen the blade."

抹字的基本解释

抹
mǒ
涂：涂抹。抹粉（喻美化或掩饰）。抹黑（喻丑化）。抹子（瓦工用来抹灰泥的器具。亦称“抹刀”）。
揩，擦：抹拭。哭天抹泪。
除去，勾掉，不计在内：抹煞。
轻微的痕迹：“林梢一抹青如画”。一抹余晖。
擦揩拭涂

抹
mò
把和好了的泥或灰涂上后弄平：抹墙。抹石灰。
紧靠着绕过去：抹头。抹身。
用手指轻按，奏弦乐指法的一种。
擦揩拭涂

抹
mā
擦：抹桌子。
按着向下移动、除去：抹不下脸来（碍于脸面或情面）。
擦揩拭涂

抹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǒ］
［《廣韻》莫撥切，入末，明。］
(1)涂敷，涂抹。
(2)涂掉；除去。
(3)细切；砍割。
(4)碰；摸。
(5)轻微的痕迹。多与“一”连用，犹一片。
(6)一扫而过；扫视。
(7)见“抹剌”。
(8)见“抹貼”。
[②]［mò］
［《廣韻》莫撥切，入末，明。］
亦作“瀎1”。
(1)轻按。弹奏弦乐器的一种指法。
(2)把和好了的泥或灰涂上后再用抹子弄平。
(3)紧贴；紧束。
(4)谓蒙住。
(5)紧挨着转弯；转。
(6)弯下，低着。
(7)平坦的牧场。亦指平坦。
[③]［mā］
(1)擦；揩拭。
(2)用手按着向某一方向移动。
(3)突然改变。指由和气变得严厉。

抹字的英文翻译

◎ 抹
apply, mop up, plaster, put on, slip off, smear

抹字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抹； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页424第04
【唐韻】莫撥切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】莫曷切，?音末。【廣韻】摩也。【字林】抹摋，滅也。【增韻】塗抹也。亂曰塗，長曰抹。【秦觀詞】山抹微雲。　又抹頟，束額飾，如抹也。【唐書·婁師德傳】募猛士討吐蕃，乃戴紅抹頟，來應詔。　又古轉月韻，勿發切，音襪。【蘇軾詩】韭芽帶土拳如蕨，膾縷堆盤纖手抹。

抹字的源字形

抹字的起名意思

暂无。

wipe
Basic explanation of words
wipe
mǒ
Smear: smear. Wipe powder (Yu beautify or cover up). Discrimination (Yu ugly). Trowel (a tool used by bricklayers to plaster plaster. Also known as "spatula").
Wipe, wipe: Wipe. Weeping day wipes tears.
Remove, tick off, don’t count: obliterate.
Slight trace: "Lin Shao has a green and picturesque touch." A touch of afterglow.
Wipe
wipe
mò
Put the mud or dust on and smooth it out: wipe the wall. Lime.
Close to go around: wipe your head. Wipe one's body.
Press lightly with your fingers to play a kind of string fingering.
Wipe
wipe
mā
Wipe: Wipe the table.
Press and move down, remove: Can't wipe the face (due to face or affection).
Wipe
wipe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mǒ]
["Guangyun" Do not dial and cut, enter the end, Ming. ]
(1) Apply and smear.
(2) To obliterate; remove.
(3) Fine cut; cut and cut.
(4) Touch; touch.
(5) Slight marks. When used in conjunction with "one", it is still a piece.
(6) Sweep by; glance.
(7) See "Erase".
(8) See "wiping".
[②]［mò］
["Guangyun" Do not dial and cut, enter the end, Ming. ]
Also known as "瀎1".
(1) Tap lightly. A fingering for playing a stringed instrument.
(2) Apply the mud or ash that has been made up and then smooth it with a trowel.
(3) Close to; tightly bound.
(4) Said to be blindfolded.
(5) Turn next to; turn.
(6) Bend down, lower down.
(7) Flat pasture. Also refers to flat.
[③] [mā]
(1) Wipe; wipe.
(2) Move in a certain direction by pressing it with your hand.
(3) Sudden change. The reason for the harmony becomes severe.
wipe
English translation of words
◎ Wipe
apply, mop up, plaster, put on, slip off, smear
wipe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　MO; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 424 04
[Tang Yun] Do not cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Do not cut,? At the end of the sound. [Guang Yun] Mo Ye. [Zi Lin] Wipe, wipe out. 【Zeng Yun】Smear also. Chaotic said to paint, long said to wipe. [Qin Guan Ci] The mountain wipes the clouds.　I wiped the buns again, and decorated my forehead as if I wiped it. [Book of Tang·The Biography of Lou Shide] When recruiting warriors to discuss Tubo, they wear red wiping windshields and come to answer the edict.　The ancient rhyme of the moon, don’t cut it, sound socks. 【Su Shi's poems】The leek buds carry soil fist like fern, and the wisps are piled and wiped by hand.

вытирать
mŏ / mò / ma
вытирать
вытирать
mǒ, mò, mā
I mǒ
1) тереть, вытирать; проводить рукой по...
吃完饭把嘴一抹就走了 поел, вытер рот рукой и пошёл
2) играть (напр. в кости)
抹骨牌 играть в кости
3) перерезать
抹脖子 перерезать себе горло, покончить с собой
4) вычёркивать, вымарывать; отбрасывать, не принимать в расчёт; уничтожать
把尾零抹了 отбросить остаток
把这行字抹了 вымарать эту строчку
5) мазать, намазывать, наносить (краску); натирать; наводить
抹上点药膏 помазать мазью
月光在淡灰色的墙上抹了一层银色 лунный свет посеребрил светло-серую стену
6) счётное слово для зари, света солнца или луны
II mò
1) замазывать, заравнивать; штукатурить
抹墙 штукатурить стену
2) сворачивать, поворачивать; огибать
前军却好抹过林子 авангард как раз огибал лес
III mā разг.
1) вытирать, стирать (пыль)
抹桌子 стереть со стола
2) прижимать рукой и двигаться вниз; снимать, спускать
抹下帽子来 снял шапку
3) освобождать, отстранять (от должности)
Radicals: 扌, 未  (fingers, jet)
Meaning Mnemonic
Put your fingers in a jet if you want to erase them from existence. You aren't just chopping or burning them off. There's like, no trace of them at all. Your parents can't even remember if you were born with fingers or not. Jets are that powerful.
Imagine your fingers slowly getting closer and closer to the jet's engine. It feels like it's going to suck your whole body in. And you better watch out, because if it does you'll be erased from the planet. And probably from time itself.
Reading Mnemonic
You're almost done erasing your fingers when the jet starts sucking all of you in. You would try to grab the closest thing to you, but your fingers don't exist anymore, so you hold onto the mats (まつ) at your feet with your toes. The mats are super strong (they're made for jets, after all) and you manage to save yourself!
Now you're so thankful to the mats. If they weren't there you might have erased your whole body! Thank you mats! I'll never walk on you without thanking you for your service again!

一 (один), ｜, 亠 (крышка), ハ, 扎, 木 (дерево)
Фонетик: 末 (すえ、マツ、バツ окончание). Растирать рукой (扌) в ничто (окончание, 末).
